Generate Data
=============

skedm comes with both 1D and 2D test data. These built in functions allow you to quickly explore the behavior of different systems.

1 Dimensional
^^^^^^^^^^^^^

.. automodule:: skedm.data
   :members: logistic_map, noisy_periodic, noisy_periodic_complicated, noise_1D, lorenz


2 Dimensional
^^^^^^^^^^^^^

.. automodule:: skedm.data
   :members: chaos_2d, periodic_2d, periodic_brown, brown_noise, noise_2d, chaos_3d, random_circles, circle_in_circle, circles_with_stuff, random_sized_circles, voronoi_matrix
